top.title: Syrian government reaches deal with Kurdish-led forces
top.summary: The deal will see the gradual integration of Kurdish forces and administration into the Syrian state.

top.title: Trump says 'it would be great' if US 'didn't have to use' military force on Iran
top.summary: The US president says he has told Iran it has to do "two things" to avoid military action, as the US builds up its forces in the Gulf.

top.title: Ukraine sees quieter night as Trump says Putin will not attack its cities
top.summary: Russia said the US president requested a pause in strikes on Kyiv until 1 February, a move Trump said was prompted by the cold weather.

top.title: Apple reports best-ever iPhone sales as Mac dips
top.summary: The company's revenue was boosted by iPhone sales, but sales of its wearable tech and Mac computers dipped.

top.title: He calls me sweetheart and winks at me - but he's not my boyfriend, he's AI
top.summary: George is an avatar on my mobile but claims to know  what makes me tick.

top.title: UK bans Coinbase ads implying crypto can ease cost of living concerns
top.summary: The ASA upheld complaints that Coinbase's adverts trivialised the risks of investing in cryptocurrency.

title.#text: Melania documentary creators say its big price tag wasn’t bribery
The small film that answers the big questions
Microsoft is experimenting with a top menu bar for Windows 11
